reviewText: Rosamond Bernier is a magnificent lecturer on art.  It is no wonder her lectures at the NY Metropolitan Museum are sold out in minutes.  She swoops into the auditorium in a glorious designer gown, uses no notes, no tacky Power Point slides (only great slides of the artists and their art) and speaks enthrallingly for an hour.  And all of this at seventy plus!  She is to give her last lecture at the Met this month and she is now a fabulous, svelte ninety
